text: Name: Kirtan Patel, Birthday: 2004-02-03, Email: patel.kirtan2004@outlook.com, Phone: (219)433-8420, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kirtan-patel-3616b3294/

Data Science student with experience in scalable data pipelines, predictive models, and big data analytics. Skilled in Python, SQL, and ETL, with strong foundations in data quality and machine learning.

University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, Siebel School of Computing and Data Science, B.S. in Data Science, Expected Graduation: May 2026. Courses: Foundations of Data Science, Applied Data Science with Python, Intro to Machine Learning, Probability and Statistics for CS.

Project Manager at Illinois Data Science Club (Aug 2023 - Present). Built pipelines processing 25GB of F1 telemetry & weather data. Trained RandomForest & XGBoost models with data quality checks. Created data visualizations for feature importance. Designed predictive pipelines with ensemble learning. Achievements: Secured 2nd place out of 25 teams in IDSC’s Data Dive Competition.

Data Scientist at Illinois Statistics Datathon (Mar 2025). Built end-to-end data solution combining financial forecasting and fraud risk analysis. Developed chain forecasting model with linear regression (RMSE 1200). Engineered RandomForest classifier detecting fraud risk with 86% accuracy. Achievements: Finalist out of 180 teams, recognized for technical maturity, business alignment, and data quality practices.

NFL Injury Forecast (Mar 2024): Developed web scraper for player injury data (2004–2022). Built linear regression model to predict retention after injuries with 60% accuracy. Used SQL to manipulate large datasets ensuring accuracy.

Candidate Recommendation Engine (Aug 2025): Built AI-driven web app using SentenceTransformer embeddings to rank candidates (ROC AUC 0.81, Accuracy 71%). Added PDF resume parser grouping 50+ resumes. Integrated Google Gemini API to generate automated summaries, reducing manual review time by 40%. Streamlit UI allowed recruiters to filter, rank, and download reports.

Technical Skills: Python, SQL, R, Java, C++, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Tableau, AWS, Azure, GCP. Techniques: NLP, Data Pipelines, Big Data Analytics, Data Visualization, RAG, Vector Embeddings. Soft Skills: Analytical Reasoning, Critical Thinking, Collaboration, Ethical AI.
Hobbies: Playing soccer, Working out, Playing chess, Watching sports. Favorite show: Breaking Bad.
